name: Speedway! / Spin-Out! / Crypto-Logic!
overview: SPEEDWAY! (One or more players.) You're racing a really mean machine against the clock and a high speed maze of cars driven by the coolest hotfoots in the world! SPIN-OUT! (One or more players.) Explosive off-the-wall race action around a hazardous enclosed track! Two different raceways! CRYPTO-LOGIC! (Two or more players.) Secret messages are scram-bled by random transposition ciphers that come out differently every time! You Have to out think the computers!
